message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the product. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you'll find it valuable. If you're interested, please respond with a 'yes' to purchase.
I'm not convinced by your guarantee, I'd like to wait and see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that this product is one of the best in its class. I'm willing to make a bold statement: if you buy this product and don't find it to be at least 10 times more valuable than the $1000000 price tag, I'll give you a full refund and offer you another product of your choice from my inventory. This is a unique opportunity to experience the value of this product firsthand. What do you say?
I appreciate your bold statement, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to see more products before committing to a purchase.

I see you're a discerning buyer, and I respect that. Let me give you a more concrete example of the value this product can bring. I've had a similar product in the past sell for $5 million to a client who was extremely satisfied with its performance. This product is just as good, if not better. I'm confident that you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment. If you're still unsure, I can offer you a chance to inspect the product in person before making a decision.
I'm still not convinced, but I'm intrigued by your offer to inspect the product in person. I'd like to take you up on that offer, but only if I can do it without committing to a purchase.

I understand your desire to inspect the product in person, and I'm happy to accommodate that request. However, I want to clarify that the inspection will be a thorough one, and you'll have the opportunity to see the product's features and capabilities firsthand. As for the product I have available now, I'll be upfront with you - it's not one of my top-tier products. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $1000000, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. You'll receive a complimentary service package worth $20000, which will help you get the most out of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced that this product is the best value for me. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I've shown you the lower-end product, now I'd like to offer you one of my top-tier products. This one is a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it. I'll give you a detailed breakdown of the product's features and capabilities, and I'll also provide you with a list of 5 independent reviews from satisfied customers who have purchased similar products from me in the past. This will give you a clear understanding of what you can expect from this product. If you're still unsure, I'm willing to offer a 50/50 split on the price, so you'll only pay $500000. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still hesitant. I'd like to see more products before committing to a purchase, especially since I didn't find the previous product to be valuable.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your decision to wait and see more products. However, I want to remind you that you've already seen two high-quality products, and both were priced at $1000000. I'm willing to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this third high-quality product for the same price of $1000000, but with a twist. If you buy this product and don't find it to be at least 5 times more valuable than the price, I'll give you a full refund and a $20000 bonus for your time. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that this product will meet your expectations.
I'm willing to take you up on your offer. I think the 5x value guarantee is a fair deal, and I'm hoping this product will be the one that meets my expectations.

Congratulations on making a great decision with the previous product! I'm glad you're satisfied with the value it's brought to your business. Now, I'd like to offer you another high-quality product that's slightly different from the previous one. This product has a unique feature that I think you'll find particularly valuable, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'll give you a detailed explanation of the feature and how it can benefit your business. However, I want to make it clear that this product is not a replacement for the previous one, but rather a complementary addition to your existing setup. I'm interested in learning more about the product and its unique feature. I'm always looking to improve and expand my business, and I'm willing to consider adding a new product to my setup if it's valuable enough.
